master.description: Master mode metering and exposure configuration selected for multicam usecases.

slave.description: Slave mode metering and exposure configuration selected for multicam usecases.

luxIndexSelection.description: Lux index value to be assigned of slave.

enableRelSensitivity.description: Setting this flag enables relative sensitivity logic for exposure sync.

enableExposureTimeMatch.description: Setting this flag enables the matching of slave exposure time to master exposure time.

expCompMultiplier.description: Exposure Compensation Multiplier to adjust sensitivity difference factor.

refAbsSensitivity.description: Absolute sensitivity values for different lux conditions.

zoneData.description: Reference sensitivity values to be used when absolute sensitivity used for multi-cam.

CCTBasedExpComp.description: CCT-based adjustments to make dual camera exposures similar

zoneData.description: Ratio to compensate slave camera exposure based on CCT index

mtrMixConfig.description: AEC Static and Dynamic Weight allocation tuning parameters.

lumaMixingWeight.description: The weight given to the luma value of the self camera while mixing.

targetMixingWeight.description: The weight given to the target value of the self camera while mixing.

weight.description: Weight is computed based on absolute difference between self target and peer luma. Higher the difference, greater the weight. Weight will be used to compute the final target as: Self target * weight + (1 - weight) * peer luma.
